item.title: Golang Fundamentals
item.author: Author
item.description: Hello Golang Golang is developed and published by Google, Kubernetes - which is know as a tool for container orchestration, is mainly developed by Go, so Go is very important in Cloud Native. In this article, we are gonna introduce all kinds of grammars and data structure in Golang, also we will share some tips for programming. Declaring and Assignment Declaring a variable in Go is similar to JavaScript, you
